name: Panic Inc
description:
Hello!

This game was mad for GMTK Game Jam 2020 which was my first game jam. The theme of the jam was "Out of Control" and the time limit was 48h.

The game is an anti-infiltration game where the goal is to be seen by as many security guards as possible, trigger every alarm you can and spread  chaos everywhere you can.

If you're stuck because of a bug that went unresolved, press Space at any time to restart the current level.

I made the game entirely alone using GameMaker Studio 2 as my engine, paint.net for the graphic assets. The sounds were found on freesound.org. The font is from Chaos Fonts.

Hope you'll have fun! :)
